tooltip.sculkhorde.default:
Hold [§eSHIFT§r] to show Functionality.
Hold [§eCTRL§r] to show Lore.
tooltip.sculkhorde.in_development: §7§oThis Item is In Development. It is not meant to be used in survival. It is only meant for testing and development purposes.
tooltip.sculkhorde.warden_beef: §7§oA forbidden food. A dev item that is used to enable in-development features when eaten.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_node_spawner: §7§oCalls the node spawn procedure at the player's location.
tooltip.sculkhorde.custom_item_projectil: §7§oThis is a dev item to test projectiles. Its the parent class of all projectiles. I decided to add it as an item just for tom foolery
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_acidic_projecti: §7§oAn acidic projectile created by a §e§oSculk Spitter§f§7§o. Has a chance to drop when the projectile hits a block. Can be thrown.
§7§oAn acidic substance that when touched. It is warm and volatile. Can dissolve any organic or non-organic substance
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_clump.functio: §7§oObtained from mining §e§oCalcite Ore§f§7§o from a §e§oLiving Rock structure§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_ore.functiona: §7§oCan be obtained from §e§oLiving Rock Structures§f§7§o surrounding §e§oSculk Nodes§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_resin.functiona: §7§oObtained from shearing the §e§oMature Cells§f§7§o under §e§oSculk Bee Hives§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_log.lore: §7§oA material that deceivingly looks like wood, but is made of a strange, bone-like material.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_crying_obsid: A strange infested block. You can hear the cries of the dead within it. Used to craft Crying Souls.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_node: A highly sophisticated neural hub found within the Sculk Horde. It acts as a secondary brain for the Sculk Node, facilitating the intricate control of the local Sculk network.
tooltip.sculkhorde.spike:
A sharp and dangerous spike.
Infects all living things that touch it. Immediately breaks upon contact with a non-sculk entity.
tooltip.sculkhorde.tendrils: A vine-like flora that almost feels like flesh.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_summoner.functi: §7§oA block that summons Sculk Horde reinforcements. It is alerted by sound vibrations. Has a cool down. Once alerted, will spawn enemies faster.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_summoner.lore: §7§oA strange and mysterious block that uses mass to conjure sculk reinforcements from the surrounding sculk-infested blocks. It has a very manufactured, yet alive-look to it, similar to a Sculk Shrieker. In the center of it are trapped souls that are dammed to serve the horde until they are released. Your tempted to stick your hand in the middle, but you prefer to keep all your limbs.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest.functi: §7§oA hive that is home to a colony of Sculk Bees. Generates mass and Infection from Sculk Bees. §e§oCells§r§7§o underneath it can be harvested for §e§oSculk Resin§r§7§o. Spawns naturally from Sculk Block Infestation
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest.lore: §7§oA housing unit for Sculk Bees. Sculk Bees will harvest mass from Sculk Flora and deposit it into the hive. This will in turn, generate mass, and spread infection. Taking these out as soon as possible is a high priority.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest_cell.f: §7§oCan be harvested for §e§oSculk Resin§r§7§o with shears, when mature. Maturity is indicated when blue resin is visible.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest_cell.l: §7§oA cell that is home to a colony of Sculk Bees. These Cells serve as tunnels to bees, and storage for Resin.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock.fun: Decorative and can be used to craft §e§oInfestation Ward§r§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock.lor: §7§oThis rock feels warm to the touch, but also very hard and durable. It flexes as if it is breathing.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock_roo: §7§oThe core of the Living Rock Structure. This core allows the structure to regenerate.
§7§oThe core of the Living Rock Structure. The core is nearly indistinguishable from the rest of the structure. You must be careful not to break it. However, it always appears in the center.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_structure_tester: This is a dev block to test structures. It will spawn a structure at the block's location.
tooltip.sculkhorde.crying_souls.function: §7§oUsed to craft Pure Souls and the Sculk Sweeper.
tooltip.sculkhorde.crying_souls.lore: §7§oThe souls of the assimilated. They lost their bodies, memories, and personality. The only thing that remains is their anguish.
tooltip.sculkhorde.essence_of_purity.fun: §7§oA pure essence that is used to craft purity items.
tooltip.sculkhorde.essence_of_purity.lor: §7§oIt radiates the warmth of an early sunrise and fills you with a feeling of comfort.
tooltip.sculkhorde.pure_souls.functional: §7§oUsed to craft Infestation Purifiers and the §r§6Heart of Purity.
tooltip.sculkhorde.pure_souls.lore: §7§oSouls of the Assimilated that have been purified. You brought them peace and tranquility.
tooltip.sculkhorde.chunk_o_brain.functio: §7§oObtained from destroying the core of a Sculk Node. Used to craft a dormant heart of the horde.
tooltip.sculkhorde.chunk_o_brain.lore: §7§oA warm chunk of brain. You can feel the electrical pulses. Despite severing it from it's shell, it is still alive. Maybe you can use this.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dormant_heart_of_the_: §7§oA dormant variant of the Heart of the Horde. To activate it, you must put it in a soul harvester, then sacrifice souls to it.
§7§oA cold empty vessel for souls. In it's current state, it is untainted by sin.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_the_horde.fu: §7§oAn item made from putting a dormant heart of the horde in a soul harvester and then sacrificing souls to it. Used to obtain the §r§6Heart of Purity.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_the_horde.lo: §7§oA culmination of sin and assimilation. An entity so foul and repulsive, just holding it is enough for your hand to feel numb and weak. Packed within is numerous tortured souls. You can hear their whispers begging for sweet release from eternal assimilation.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_purity.funct: §7§oDeactivates the Ancient Node when used on it; thus, §cdefeating§r§7§o the Sculk Horde.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_purity.lore: §7§oA living, beating heart that radiates warmth and purity. Holding this monumental artifact makes you feel pure and mighty. Packed within is a collection of souls you have freed from the horde. Now, they aid you in your conquest one final time before they are put to rest.
tooltip.sculkhorde.eye_of_purity.functio: §7§oUsed to locate Sculk Nodes. §e§oRight-click§r§7§o to throw it. If your in the same dimension as a node, it will head toward a node.
tooltip.sculkhorde.eye_of_purity.lore: §7§oIt seems purifying an eye of ender creates an entity attracted to the presence of nodes. This entity radiates warmth and shines with a golden hue.
tooltip.sculkhorde.soul_harvester.functi: §7§oA block used to convert a Dormant Heart of the Horde into an active variant. Requires souls to function. Sacrifice mobs near this block to collect souls.
tooltip.sculkhorde.soul_harvester.lore: §7§oSteal the souls of the living, then dam them to a fate worse than death. Putting your ear up to this block, you can hear their cries for help. This soul harvester can imbue objects with the collected souls, transforming them into objects of value and sin.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infestation_ward_bloc: §7§oA block that prevents Sculk Infestation from spreading to any of it's neighboring blocks. This includes diagonals. Ideally used to create perimeters around an area to prevent block infestation from crossing.
§7§oThe sturdiness of living rock, combined with §e§oEssence of Purity§r§7§o, creates a great repellent for block infestation. Walking on it makes you feel angelic.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_mass_infectinator: Use at your own risk. A dev block that continuously infects an extremely large area. Made for Karat Feng's unquenchable conquest to infest everything he lays his eyes upon.
§7§oRight-click to drop back into item.
An entity that when spawned, removes Sculk Infestation from the area. The Sculk Horde will attack it.
§7§oThe souls you saved from damnation now serve you in your conquest to take on the Horde.
tooltip.sculkhorde.purification_flask.fu: §7§oThrow at Infestation to clear it up. Cures Burrowed, Lure, and Diseased Cysts status effects. Crafted by surrounding §e§oEssence of Purity§r§7§o with glass bottles.
tooltip.sculkhorde.purification_flask.lo: §7§oA brewed solution to a very real problem. Holding it in your hand makes you feel a calming warmth akin to the warmth of the sun on a chilly day.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_sweeper_sword.f: §7§oA sword with a large sweeping edge. Only does 50% damage to non-sculk mobs. Attacking Sculk Mobs builds up a charge that can be released with right-click. This special attack will spawn Sculk Spines at the feet of Sculk Mobs.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_sweeper_sword.l: §7§oA special sword designed to kill swarms of Sculk Mobs. The blade is forged from the cleaver of a §7§oSculk Enderman§r§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_enderman_cleave: §7§oThe blade from the cleaver of a §7§oSculk Enderman§r§7§o. It is used to craft §7§oThe Sculk Sweeper§r§7§o.
§7§oIt appears to be made of a sculk-ified bone-like material. Extremely sharp and tough like metal.
sounds.sculkhorde.raid_scout: A distant Sculk Endemran scouting out a raid location.
tooltip.sculkhorde.coin_of_contribution: A coin representing the immense value you contributed to this mod. Sculk Horde cannot exist without people like you. This is a personal thank you from me. Please enjoy Sculk Horde :)
